ai-iti65:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti65:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these kinds of good conduct.
ai-iti65:2.3_0: Good conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-iti65:2.4_0: These are the three kinds of good conduct.”
ai-iti65:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti65:4.3_0: when their body breaks up, that wise person
ai-iti65:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti65:5.2_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
